species.name: dedenne
descriptions: A Dedenne’s whiskers pick up electrical waves other Dedenne send out. These Pokémon share locations of food or electricity with one another.
It sneaks into people’s homes and steals electricity from their outlets. When your electric bill seems off, it’s the handiwork of this rascal.
Its upper whiskers are sensors that survey its surroundings. Its lower whiskers are organs that shoot electricity.
Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.
It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.

abilities.name: cheek-pouch
abilities.effect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.

abilities.name: pickup
abilities.effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

abilities.name: plus
abilities.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.
